verses.verse: וַיִּסַּ֨ע <WH5265> journeyed מִשָּׁ֤ם <WH8033> there אַבְרָהָם֙ <WH85> And Abraham אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> country הַנֶּ֔גֶב <WH5045> from thence toward the south וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelled בֵּין־ <WH996> between קָדֵ֖שׁ <WH6946> between Kadesh וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between שׁ֑וּר <WH7793> and Shur וַיָּ֖גָר <WH1481> and sojourned בִּגְרָֽר׃ <WH1642> in Gerar

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> And Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> of שָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> Sarah אִשְׁתּ֖וֹ <WH802> his wife אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> She [is] my sister הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> sent אֲבִימֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH40> and Abimelech מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king גְּרָ֔ר <WH1642> of Gerar וַיִּקַּ֖ח <WH3947> and took אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרָֽה׃ <WH8283> Sarah

וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> came אֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> But God אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH40> to Abimelech בַּחֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> in a dream הַלָּ֑יְלָה <WH3915> by night וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ הִנְּךָ֥ <WH2009> Behold מֵת֙ <WH4191> to him Behold thou [art but] a dead man עַל־ <WH5921> because הָאִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> for the woman אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom לָקַ֔חְתָּ <WH3947> which thou hast taken וְהִ֖וא <WH1931> he בְּעֻ֥לַת <WH1166> wife בָּֽעַל׃ <WH1167> for she [is] a man's

וַאֲבִימֶ֕לֶךְ <WH40> But Abimelech לֹ֥א <WH3808> had not קָרַ֖ב <WH7126> had not come near אֵלֶ֑יהָ <WH413> about וַיֹּאמַ֕ר <WH559> her and he said אֲדֹנָ֕י <WH136> Lord הֲג֥וֹי <WH1471> A nation גַּם־ <WH1571> even צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> also a righteous תַּהֲרֹֽג׃ <WH2026> wilt thou slay

הֲלֹ֨א <WH3808> not ה֤וּא <WH1931> he not unto me She אָֽמַר־ <WH559> Said לִי֙ אֲחֹ֣תִי <WH269> not הִ֔וא <WH1931> she וְהִֽיא־ <WH1931> himself גַם־ <WH1571> even הִ֥וא <WH1931> himself אָֽמְרָ֖ה <WH559> herself said אָחִ֣י <WH251> He [is] my brother ה֑וּא <WH1931> himself בְּתָם־ <WH8537> in the integrity לְבָבִ֛י <WH3824> of my heart וּבְנִקְיֹ֥ן <WH5356> and innocency כַּפַּ֖י <WH3709> of my hands עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> have I done זֹֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said אֵלָ֨יו <WH413> then הָֽאֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> And God בַּחֲלֹ֗ם <WH2472> unto him in a dream גַּ֣ם <WH1571> Yea אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I יָדַ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH3045> I know כִּ֤י <WH3588> in בְתָם־ <WH8537> this in the integrity לְבָבְךָ֙ <WH3824> of thy heart עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> that thou didst זֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise וָאֶחְשֹׂ֧ךְ <WH2820> for I also withheld גַּם־ <WH1571> also אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I אֽוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> מֵחֲטוֹ־ <WH2398> thee from sinning לִ֑י עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> after that לֹא־ <WH3808> did not נְתַתִּ֖יךָ <WH5414> against me therefore suffered לִנְגֹּ֥עַ <WH5060> I thee not to touch אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> about

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now הָשֵׁ֤ב <WH7725> Now therefore restore אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> [his] wife הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> the man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> is a נָבִ֣יא <WH5030> for he [is] a prophet ה֔וּא <WH1931> and he וְיִתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> and he shall pray בַּֽעַדְךָ֖ <WH1157> for thee וֶֽחְיֵ֑ה <WH2421> and thou shalt live וְאִם־ <WH518> if אֵֽינְךָ֣ <WH369> not מֵשִׁ֗יב <WH7725> and if thou restore דַּ֚ע <WH3045> [her] not know כִּי־ <WH3588> that מ֣וֹת <WH4191> thou that thou shalt surely תָּמ֔וּת <WH4191> die אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who לָֽךְ׃

וַיַּשְׁכֵּ֨ם <WH7925> rose early אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> Therefore Abimelech בַּבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called לְכָל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָ֔יו <WH5650> all his servants וַיְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> and told אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> all these things הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּאָזְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH241> in their ears וַיִּֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> afraid הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH376> and the men מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> were sore

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> Then Abimelech לְאַבְרָהָ֗ם <WH85> Abraham וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֜וֹ מֶֽה־ <WH4100> What עָשִׂ֤יתָ <WH6213> unto him What hast thou done לָּ֙נוּ֙ וּמֶֽה־ <WH4100> and how חָטָ֣אתִי <WH2398> unto us? and what have I offended לָ֔ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that הֵבֵ֧אתָ <WH935> thee that thou hast brought עָלַ֛י <WH5921> and וְעַל־ <WH5921> on מַמְלַכְתִּ֖י <WH4467> on me and on my kingdom חֲטָאָ֣ה <WH2401> sin גְדֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> a great מַעֲשִׂים֙ <WH4639> deeds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after לֹא־ <WH3808> not יֵֽעָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> unto me that ought not to be done עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> to be done עִמָּדִֽי׃ <WH5978> against

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֖לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech אֶל־ <WH413> to אַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> unto Abraham מָ֣ה <WH4100> What רָאִ֔יתָ <WH7200> sawest thou כִּ֥י <WH3588> that עָשִׂ֖יתָ <WH6213> that thou hast done אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> act הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אַבְרָהָ֔ם <WH85> And Abraham כִּ֣י <WH3588> Because אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> Because I thought רַ֚ק <WH7535> Surely אֵין־ <WH369> there יִרְאַ֣ת <WH3374> the fear אֱלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> of God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> [is] not in this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַהֲרָג֖וּנִי <WH2026> and they will slay me עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> sake אִשְׁתִּֽי׃ <WH802> for my wife's

וְגַם־ <WH1571> Besides אָמְנָ֗ה <WH546> And yet indeed אֲחֹתִ֤י <WH269> [she is] my sister בַת־ <WH1323> she [is] the daughter אָבִי֙ <WH1> of my father הִ֔וא <WH1931> he אַ֖ךְ <WH389> also לֹ֣א <WH3808> not בַת־ <WH1323> but not the daughter אִמִּ֑י <WH517> of my mother וַתְּהִי־ <WH1961> became לִ֖י לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> and she became my wife

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came כַּאֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which הִתְע֣וּ <WH8582> caused me to wander אֹתִ֗י <WH853> אֱלֹהִים֮ <WH430> And it came to pass when God מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house אָבִי֒ <WH1> from my father's וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> that I said לָ֔הּ זֶ֣ה <WH2088> to her This חַסְדֵּ֔ךְ <WH2617> unto her This [is] thy kindness אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which תַּעֲשִׂ֖י <WH6213> which thou shalt shew עִמָּדִ֑י <WH5978> against אֶ֤ל <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> unto me at every place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which נָב֣וֹא <WH935> whither we shall come שָׁ֔מָּה <WH8033> in it אִמְרִי־ <WH559> say לִ֖י אָחִ֥י <WH251> of me He [is] my brother הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אֲבִימֶ֜לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech צֹ֣אן <WH6629> sheep וּבָקָ֗ר <WH1241> and oxen וַעֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> and menservants וּשְׁפָחֹ֔ת <WH8198> and womenservants וַיִּתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and gave לְאַבְרָהָ֑ם <WH85> [them] unto Abraham וַיָּ֣שֶׁב <WH7725> and restored ל֔וֹ אֵ֖ת <WH853> שָׂרָ֥ה <WH8283> him Sarah אִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH802> his wife

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֲבִימֶ֔לֶךְ <WH40> And Abimelech הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold אַרְצִ֖י <WH776> Behold my land לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> [is] before thee בַּטּ֥וֹב <WH2896> good בְּעֵינֶ֖יךָ <WH5869> affliction שֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> dwell

וּלְשָׂרָ֣ה <WH8283> And unto Sarah אָמַ֗ר <WH559> he said הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> Behold נָתַ֜תִּי <WH5414> Behold I have given אֶ֤לֶף <WH505> a thousand כֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> [pieces] of silver לְאָחִ֔יךְ <WH251> thy brother הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold הוּא־ <WH1931> he לָךְ֙ כְּס֣וּת <WH3682> behold he [is] to thee a covering עֵינַ֔יִם <WH5869> of the eyes לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> and before וְאֵ֥ת <WH854> and before כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all וְנֹכָֽחַת׃ <WH3198> unto all that [are] with thee and with all [other] thus she was reproved

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> prayed אַבְרָהָ֖ם <WH85> So Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> to הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> unto God וַיִּרְפָּ֨א <WH7495> healed אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> and God אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִימֶ֧לֶךְ <WH40> Abimelech וְאֶת־ <WH853> אִשְׁתּ֛וֹ <WH802> and his wife וְאַמְהֹתָ֖יו <WH519> and his maidservants וַיֵּלֵֽדוּ׃ <WH3205> and they bare

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for עָצֹ֤ר <WH6113> had fast עָצַר֙ <WH6113> closed up יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> For the LORD בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all רֶ֖חֶם <WH7358> all the wombs לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אֲבִימֶ֑לֶךְ <WH40> of Abimelech עַל־ <WH5921> and דְּבַ֥ר <WH1697> because שָׂרָ֖ה <WH8283> of Sarah אֵ֥שֶׁת <WH802> wife אַבְרָהָֽם׃ <WH85> Abraham's ס
